posts.post_content:
Posted By: Nate
Hello, I'm looking to purhase a low-grade 1887 N284 Buchner Gold Coin "King" Kelly (catching pose).  Card does not need to be graded....just beat-up and affordable.  If anyone wants to part with such a card, I'd be more than willing to take it off of your hands.  Thanks for looking, Nate
